feed.title: Hosted Private Cloud Status - Incident History

entry.title: [RBX][Hosted Private Cloud] - Upgrade Storage Equipement
entry.content:
THIS IS A SCHEDULED EVENT Feb 2, 12:00 - 15:00 UTC

Jan 25, 12:22 UTC
Scheduled - Start time : 02/02/2023 12:00 UTC
End time : 02/02/2023 15:00 UTC
Service impact : A downtime will be happen ~3h.
Service improvement : As part of our continuous improvement policy, we will upgrade some storage equipment.

End time : 02/02/2023 09:00 UTC

entry.title: [RBX7][HostedPrivateCloud] - Network equipent operation

Jan 26, 08:48 UTC

Here is the new schedule :
Start time : 02/02/2023 05:00 UTC

End time : 31/01/2023 08:00UTC

Service improvement : As part of our continuous improvement policy, we will do a maintenance operation on our network equipment related to Hosted Private Cloud products to maintain consistency.

entry.title: [Global][VMware Private Cloud] - vSphere Client login
entry.content:
Jan 30, 14:39 UTC
Update - We are continuing to investigate this issue.

Jan 30, 14:37 UTC
Investigating - Start time : 27/01/2023 13:00 UTC
Service impact : The vSphere Client login page is returning 500 error preventing login to vSphere.
Ongoing actions : Our technical teams are working on the issue. Update will be post as significant progress is made.
Root cause : An incompatible configuration version is being deployed on "SSL gateway" (the machine that acts as a bridge & firewall between your Hosted Private Cloud and the internet and allows you to connect to the vSphere web client among others things).

entry.title: [EU/CA][VMware Private Cloud] - vCenter and ESXi major upgrade
entry.content:
Jan 30, 07:00 UTC
In progress - Scheduled maintenance is currently in progress. We will provide updates as necessary.

Jan 24, 18:45 UTC
Scheduled - Start time : 30/01/2023 07:00 UTC 
End time : 03/02/2023 17:00 UTC 
Service impact : The management plane will be unavailable for 1 hour during the maintenance schedule.
Service improvement : As part of our continuous improvement policy of our infrastructure, we are rolling an upgrade for the VMware vCenter Server Appliance solution.
The operation will be done by pool. A communication will be send to inform customers of their specific schedule.

entry.title: [EU/CA/Secnumcloud][Hosted Private Cloud] - vROps
entry.content:
Jan 30, 07:00 UTC
In progress - Scheduled maintenance is currently in progress. We will provide updates as necessary.

Jan 24, 18:15 UTC
Scheduled - Start time : 30/01/2023 07:00 UTC 
End time : 03/02/2023 17:00 UTC 
Service impact : vROps unavailable during the upgrade
Service improvement : As part of our continuous improvement policy, we need to upgrade vROps (vRealize Operations) to its last version.
The duration will be one hour per vrom.
Customer can reschedule maintenance.
Customer will be notified by email when the maintenance is scheduled.

entry.title: [RBX8][Hosted Private Cloud] - R808R26/R808R27
entry.content:
Jan 13, 14:40 UTC
Resolved - Start Time : 13/01/2023 10:44 UTC
End Time : 13/01/2023 13:15 UTC
Technical impact (DC/geographical area) : RBX8
Root cause : Maintenance link that caused an electrical issue. All services are operational since 13:15 UTC.

Jan 13, 13:47 UTC
Update - Ongoing actions : Following the implementation of this maintenance: Maintenance link
an electrical problem has occurred which caused the servers in racks R808R26 and R808R27 temporarily unreachable.
Our teams are working on this issue

Jan 13, 13:01 UTC
Identified - Start time : 13/01/2023 10:44 UTC
Service impact : Servers are temporarily unavailable in racks R808R26 and R808R27
Root cause : Electrical issue
Ongoing actions :Our teams are currently working to solve the problem
